title: The Right-Eyed World
description:
"Human beings must be happy no matter what."

A society where emotions are controlled by a chip. and hackers that can hack the chips to make the people hallucinate.
Follow the survival of Ah-Yeon, a white hacker who suffers from depression in a world where negative emotions are forbidden.

To read this in Tachiyomi, download the Cubari extension and search Cubari: gist/JOZo6
author: koer
